name: PDFAppearanceCharacteristics
desc: An object that represents appearance characteristics of a widget annotation.

items.name: var backgroundColor: UIColor?
items.desc: The background color of the widget annotation.

items.name: var borderColor: UIColor?
items.desc: The border color of the widget annotation.

items.name: var caption: String?
items.desc: The text that the button widget annotation displays when the user isn’t interacting with it.

items.name: var controlType: PDFWidgetControlType
items.desc: The type of button widget annotation.

items.name: var downCaption: String?
items.desc: The text that the button widget annotation displays when the user holds down on it.

items.name: var rolloverCaption: String?
items.desc: The text that the widget annotation displays when the user hovers the pointer over it.

items.name: var rotation: Int
items.desc: The number of degrees, in multiples of 90, that the widget annotation rotates counterclockwise relative to the page.

items.name: var appearanceCharacteristicsKeyValues: [AnyHashable : Any]
items.desc: A dictionary that contains a deep copy of the appearance characteristic key-value pairs.

items.name: struct PDFAppearanceCharacteristicsKey
items.desc: Keys to control a widget’s appearance.
